bibl.title: Aspects of Conservation in the Dakhleh Oasis.
Marcia F. WISEMAN (Edited by) and Bruce E. PARR (Production Editor), The Oasis Papers 2. Proceedings of the Second International Conference of the Dakhleh Oasis Project
bibl.author: MILLS, Anthony J.

bibl.note: Considérations générales sur les dommages causés aux sites archéologiques d'Égypte par les touristes, les fouilleurs clandestins, l'exploitation des terrains, les animaux, le climat, etc.
MILLS Anthony J., Aspects of Conservation in the Dakhleh Oasis.

Marcia F. WISEMAN (Edited by) and Bruce E. PARR (Production Editor), The Oasis Papers 2. Proceedings of the Second International Conference of the Dakhleh Oasis Project = Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 12 (Oxford, 2008) pp. 153-156.
